title: Bursa Malaysia InvestHack 2020
description: Built ABull, a Chrome extension which provides better user onboarding and experience in Bursa Marketplace. Got into Top 20 and won 'Best Business Potential Award'
body:
> * Participated in Bursa Malaysia's InvestHack 2020, building ABull, a Chrome extension which provides better user onboarding and experience in Bursa Marketplace. 
> * Got into Top 20 and won 'Best Business Potential Award'
